buckets.rules

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • buckets.rules.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class Rule
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    matches against a path, and applies some action to the matched file.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
